Montgomery n 1: Canadian novelist (1874-1942) [syn: {L. M. Montgomery}, {Lucy Maud Montgomery}] 2: English general during World War II; won victories over Rommel in North Africa and led British ground forces in the invasion of Normandy (1887-1976) [syn: {Bernard Law Montgomery}, {Sir Bernard Law Montgomery}, {1st Viscount Montgomery of Alamein}] 3: the state capital of Alabama on the Mobile River [syn: {capital of Alabama}]
